@RWBranca Fact check: mostly true.

@IanDon If I were making them, I'd include one or two out-of-context votes that make the candidate look like they've abandoned their district's priorities. E.g. Voted X times for higher property taxes. Voted Y times against restrictions on lobbyists.

@IanDon Also, from a political standpoint these mailers are worthless because they don't have any persuasion content. They're just attaching an ostensibly negative label to someone and counting on that to everything.

@IanDon Just to be clear, #WalkAway is an AstroTurf slogan engineered by a handful of fringe YouTube personalities and right-wing pseudocelebs. Whatever you think of the mailers, that's not a movement, it's a hashtag pretending to be one.
